content: the dainty daisy granny square blanket is a beautiful crochet motif that s perfect for any time of the year i hope you enjoy this pattern and happy crocheting to you links to video tutorials for how to make the dainty daisy granny square joining and adding the border are included in the pattern sizes instructions given for throw blanket and baby blanket sizes finished measurements baby blanket 36 in x 36 in throw blanket 48 in x 60 in gauge each square measures approximately 2 5 in x 2 5 in pattern is written in standard us terms pattern can be viewed for free on my blog at how to make the dainty daisy granny square https //justbcrafty com/dainty-daisy-granny-square-motif-video-tutorial/ how to join and add your border https //justbcrafty com/2020/04/dainty-daisy-granny-squares-how-to-join-and-add-a-border html
